Posts.Content: May 18, 2009 05:45PM Nancy253 wrote: I too have just been diagnosed with DCIS, but no one ever mentioned what stage.  My primary gave me the positive result, and then scheduled me with a surgeon.  He told me the same as you, lumpectomy and then radiation, never mentioned a stage and I was in still in shock of the diagnosis.  I am going for a 2nd opinion next week.  Don't know what questions to ask.  Need help. Please share any info you may find and I will do the same.  Thanks and good luck, my prayers are with you.
Posts.Title: DCIS lynniejojo lynniejojo
